basics.name: Siddhardha Tagirisa
basics.label: Software Engineer / Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Software Engineer or Full Stack Developer who is a coding jack-of-all-trades who has mastered every part of the development stack with 5 years of industry experience.I have a passion to solve problems that matter to consumers by writing high-performance and scalable software. Holds a bachelor's degree in computer science from NIT Rourkela.
expertise: Back End and Front End Development
Low level and High level system design

work.summary: Axa is a French multinational insurance firm that engages in global insurance, investment management, and other financial services.
highlights: Building new jsonschema configuration-enabled platform which is being used by various cross functional teams to increase renewals and revenues.
Adding new features to several existing micro-services on a daily basis, either to reduce technical debt or to improve efficiency and performance.
As part of a project financed by the Singapore Government, increased the efficiency of insurance quotes through the use of machine learning.
Built a frontend application for letting users download documents securely.
Added various features and Reduced the size of the MyAxa mobile application by using icons instead of images that result in reduced load time.

work.summary: Setuserv is a team of data scientists, engineers and consultants committed to harnessing the vast powers of machine learning to solve distinct problems.
highlights: Led and owned the backend and frontend development of client facing application in the data pipeline for the consumption of analytics.
Optimized platform by identifying slower SQL queries using Django ORM and PostgreSQL materialized views which lead to increased performance by 40 per cent
Worked on building a four-stage data pipeline from scratch involving scraping, tagging and storing large data sets.

work.summary: Learnpedia is an edu-tech company that helps bridge the educational gap for students preparing competitive entrance exams.
highlights: Optimized doubt allocation and reduced response time from 7 days to 24 hours
Developed a mechanism for automating the loading effort of the tests, which reduced manual effort by 30 days for 5 people to 2 days.
Revamped the key features of the website using the Material Design UI, which increased the SEO ranking and the number of landings on the product.
Implemented numerous features to include market intelligence to promote easy decision-making.

work.summary: Scholas is a product developed for helping transform school administration from manual to digital.
highlights: Product: Developed core product from scratch using bootstrap 3 and ruby on rails.
Marketing: Strategically marketing to reduce the initial costs of the company.

work.summary: SchoolCom is a platform for the collection and analysis of student analytics for schools.
highlights: Bug Fixes: Fixed various small bugs in the analytics platform which was built using PHP.
Learning: Strengthened my methodology of development under guidance.

graduationProject.name: Improving Performance of Job Scheduling Algorithms in Cloud Computing Environment

currentlyWorkingOn.name: Algorithms and Data structures
currentlyWorkingOn.description: Implementing common data structures, sorting and searching algorithms in Java and Python for strengthening core concepts.

currentlyWorkingOn.name: Auto Resume
currentlyWorkingOn.description: To fetch information from LinkedIN, utilize json resume schema and build with themes, for programmers by programmers
